title: Nanosilver capping drives behavior, dissolution and (eco)toxicity to microorganisms and mammalian cells
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00063C, Paper
Arianna Bellingeri, Nina Bono, Iole Venditti, Federica Bertel√†, Luca Burratti, Claudia Faleri, Giuseppe Protano, Eugenio Paccagnini, Pietro Lupetti, Gabriele Candiani, Ilaria Corsi
Surface coating plays a fundamental role in driving silver nanoparticles (AgNPs) toxicity toward cells, but no clarity exists over the mechanism behind it. AgNPs with two different capping agents, as...
